page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT_service industry
page.content:
These are mainly in the main shopping area of{Abertillery.
Besides shops and offices the block contains the chief Post and sorting office,the telephone exchange,D.H.S.S. offices and two small bus companies.
Other work opportunities occur through schools,public houses and clubs,old age pensioners complexes and through the local authorities:_ road depot,parks department and water treatment plant.
Despite the efforts being made the area is one of increasing unemployment and declining opportunities for young people.This is highlighted by the fact that approximately one third of the working population travels out of the immediate area to find employment.
